description:
Wix# is a framework for building a complete MSI or WiX source code by using build script files written with the C# syntax.
The package contains the binaries only.  In order to use this package you need have WiX Toolset installed.
The package is tested against WIX (Windows Installer Xml) version v3.9.1208.0
releaseNotes:
* Issue #81: Cannot change ManagedUI shell dialogs size.
* Issue #82: PathFileAction objects don't emit Execute attribute
* Added dedicated FontFile class for installing fonts.
* Issue#84: Custom Action conditions that contain XML markup
* The all cases of Condition XML serialisation is now based on Condition.ToXValue()
* WixSharp.MsiParser (WixSharp.msi.dll) API improvements
* WixSharp.msi.dll added to the WixSharp.bin NuGet package
* Issue #85: Absolute path is not reflected in ManagedUI
* Fix for MsiInstallUIHandler being collected in Release builds (discussion:647701)
* Added new field Property.IsDeferred for automatic tunnelling the property into deferred custom actions.
title: Wix# (WixSharp) - Binaries
